data.comment: Today's referee, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes, has blown to start the match.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Huesca's half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
In the minute 7, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Huesca apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Rafa Mir. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
In the minute 9, In Madrid Real Madrid's Eden Hazard is caught offside.
Huesca are pushing forward but Javier Ontiveros's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Huesca in the half of Real Madrid.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Madrid Real Madrid attack through Eden Hazard. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 15, Huesca have a goal kick.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Huesca.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Huesca.
Real Madrid's Federico Valverde misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Huesca at Santiago Bernabeu.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Huesca throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes blows against Huesca's Rafa Mir for offside.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Huesca.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Free kick Real Madrid.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 25, Real Madrid push upfield and Sergio Ramos gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Huesca defence.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
In the minute 26, At Santiago Bernabeu, Real Madrid are penalized for being offside.
Important block from the Real Madrid defence as Javier Ontiveros fires in a strike for Huesca.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 28, Huesca's Sergio Gomez breaks free at Santiago Bernabeu. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Huesca at Santiago Bernabeu.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
In Madrid, Eden Hazard of Real Madrid is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 35, Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Huesca needs to be cautious. Real Madrid have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Goal! Eden Hazard gives Real Madrid a 1-0 lead in Madrid.
Great play from Federico Valverde to set up the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
In the minute 43, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Huesca's half.
The first-half has ended.
Real Madrid take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Karim Benzema.
In the minute 45, That's a fine assist from Lucas Vazquez.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Huesca make their first substitution with David Ferreiro replacing Sergio Gomez.
Javi Galan is replacing Javier Ontiveros for Huesca at Santiago Bernabeu.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
In the minute 49, Huesca's Dimitrios Siovas gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Real Madrid defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Huesca in the half of Real Madrid.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Ferland Mendy is replacing Lucas Vazquez for the home team.
In the minute 54, Federico Valverde puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Karim Benzema instrumental with a fine assist.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Huesca.
Michel (Huesca) is making a third substitution, with Sandro Ramirez replacing Kelechi Nwakali.
The away team replace Borja Garcia with Eugeni Valderrama.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Eden Hazard with Vinicius Junior. This is the second substitution made today by Zinedine Zidane.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Huesca.
Zinedine Zidane is making the team's third substitution at Santiago Bernabeu with Isco replacing Federico Valverde.
In the minute 61, Rodrygo is replacing Marco Asensio for Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Karim Benzema for Real Madrid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the home team a throw-in.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 66, Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Huesca's half.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 69, Free kick Real Madrid.
Zinedine Zidane (Real Madrid) is making a fifth substitution, with Toni Kroos replacing Casemiro.
Rodrygo of Real Madrid smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 70, Huesca drives forward and Rafa Mir gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
David Ferreiro puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-1.
Rafa Mir with an assist there.
In the minute 76, Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Dimitrios Siovas for Huesca has been booked by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 80, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a throw-in for Real Madrid, close to Huesca's area.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team have replaced Luisinho with Gaston Silva. This is the fifth substitution made today by Michel.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Throw-in Huesca.
In the minute 87, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 88, Sandro Ramirez (Huesca) has received a yellow card from Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Real Madrid just outside Huesca's area.
Real Madrid have a dangerous throw-in.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Huesca.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
Real Madrid push forward at Santiago Bernabeu and Rodrygo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Huesca defence.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes blows to end the match. The final score is 4-1.
Goal! Karim Benzema extends Real Madrid lead to 4-1 with a header.
Rodrygo instrumental with a fine assist.
